summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department accepting easements for watermain purposes over portions of property in the southwest quarter of Section 1, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; in the southwest quarter of Section 20, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M .; the southwest quarter of Section 29, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Tract 21, Pettit's Lake Washington Acre Tracts; Tract 1, Ronald Home Tracts; Lot 8, Block 3, Plat of Allendale; Tract 4, Plat of Lake Dell; in the northwest quarter of Section 8, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; and in the northeast quarter of Section 1, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; all in King County.
